label: 治部省
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Ministry (shō) in charge of marriages, inheritances, etc. of persons of the Fifth Rank (Go-i) and above, genealongies, hereditary titles (kabane ), funerals, burial mounds (haka) and mausolea (misasagi ), music, Buddhist priests (sō) and nuns (ama ), entertainment of foreign guests, etc. [五位、姓、墓、陵、僧、尼]
